info.name: Media Plan
info.description:
Mediaplan is another level of abstraction between campaigns and placements. On user interface it is called 'Orders'. Some campaigns may be rather big, so Mediaplans are convenient way to split those big campaign into smalle pieces using whatever criteria you want (time slice, publishers (medias) used and etc).

Campaign should have at least one mediaplan (which will be automatically created when new cmpaign is created).
